resources.string: The city has already been set as home city

"To deny these access requests, please deselect the checkboxes. Weather forecast function may not work properly if you denied below access requests. Go to Clock -> World clock to change the setup later."
Set desired behavior of the side keys when pressed during an alarm
Tapping on a weather icon will redirect you to %1$s where you can view the extended forecast for the day.
World clock supports up to %d cities. To add more cities, please delete existing cities from the list.
